section.title: StoneAPI.c File Reference
section.para: Included by dependency diagram for StoneAPI.c

listitem.para: void DisplayCallKernelSendService ( char * message, FRAME_TYPE type, int length)
void UpdateCommandParameter ( unsigned char cmd, int step)
int CheckMessageFinished ( unsigned char * buffer, int mLen)

void InitParameterBoard ( )
initialize numberic values region on the board.

void SetKvpBoundaries ( int minkvp, int maxkvp)
set boundries on KVP value selector.

void SetmABoundaries ( int minmA, int maxmA)
set boundries on milli-Amper value selector.

void SetTimeBoundaries ( int minTime, int maxTime)
set boundries on time value selector.

void SetJogBoundaries ( int minJog, int maxJog)
set boundries on JOG value selector.

void SetKvpStepSize ( int step)
set the step value for KVP numeric selector.

void SetmAStepSize ( int step)
set the step value for milli-amper numeric selector.

void SetTimeStepSize ( int step)
set the step value for exposure numeric selector.

void SetJogStepSize ( int step)
set the step value for JOG numeric selector.

void DisplayProcessKernelFrame ( KERNEL_FRAME )
Receive the frames that are sent by Kernel.c.

void ShowMainMenue ( )
show main menue on the display.

void DisplayAutomaticModeWarmingupState ( )
display automatic mode warmingup state

void DisplayAutomaticModePendingState ( )
display automatic mode pending state

void DisplayAutomaticModeWorkingState ( )
display automatic mode working state

void DisplayAutomaticModeErrorState ( )
display automatic mode error state

void DisplayServiceModeWarmingupState ( )
display service mode warmingup state

void DisplayServiceModeWarmupErrorState ( )
display service mode warmup error state

void DisplayServiceModePendingState ( )
display service mode pending state

void DisplayServiceModeWorkingState ( )
display service mode working state

void DisplayServiceModeErrorState ( )
display service mode error state

void RegisterStartAutomaticModeSessionListener ( StartAutomaticModeSessionEvent )
register a listener for start automatic mode event.

void RegisterGotoHomeListener ( GotoHomeEvent )
register a listener for go to home event.

void RegisterStartExposureListener ( StartExposureEvent )
register a listener for start exposure event.

void RegisterStopExposureListener ( StopExposureEvent )
register a listener for stop exposure event.

void RegisterStartWarmupEventListener ( StartWarmupEvent )
register a listener for start warmup event.

void RegisterUpdateKvpEventListener ( UpdateKvpEvent )
register a listener for update KVP event.

void RegisterUpdatemAEventListener ( UpdatemAEvent )
register a listener for update milli-amper event.

void RegisterUpdateTimeEventListener ( UpdateTimeEvent )
register a listener for update exposure time event.

void RegisterUpdateJOGEventListener ( UpdateJOGEvent )
register a listener for update JOG event.
